SFCD

A0=00232C00

data from one of the banks. which one? all of them seems to have the stats in any case...

struct
	byte id?
	byte[10] stat "curve" & base stat pairs
	vec[] spell list: level+spell pairs, ends with FF or FE (FE = promoted char, look at unpromo spell list?)
